translations.sourceText: Бывший кандидат в президенты Республики Беларусь Александр Козулин брошен за решетку за организацию акций протеста против фальсификации президентских выборов в День Воли 25 марта 2006 года.
translations.translatedText: Former presidential candidate of the Republic of Belarus, Alexander Kozulin, was jailed for organizing protests against the rigged presidential elections on Freedom Day on March 25, 2006
translations.correctedText: Former presidential candidate of the Republic of Belarus, Alexander Kozulin, was thrown into prison for organizing protest rallies against the rigged presidential election on Freedom Day, March 25, 2006

translations.sourceText: 13 июля Минский суд приговорил Александра Козулина к 5,5 годам тюремного заключения.
translations.translatedText: On July 13, a Minsk court sentenced Alyaksandr Kazulin to 5.5 years in prison.
translations.correctedText: On July 13, a Minsk court sentenced Alexander Kozulin to 5.5 years in prison.

translations.sourceText: В тюрьме Александр Козулин объявил голодовку, требуя рассмотрения белорусского вопроса в Совете Безопасности ООН.
translations.translatedText: In prison, Aleksandr Kozulin declared a hunger strike, demanding the consideration of the Belarusian issue in the UN Security Council.
translations.correctedText: In prison, Alexander Kozulin declared a hunger strike, demanding the consideration of the Belarusian problem by the UN Security Council.

translations.sourceText: Политзаключенный голодал 53 дня, потеряв более 40 килограммов веса и безвозвратно подорвав здоровье.
translations.translatedText: The political prisoner was starving for 53 days, losing more than 40 kilograms of weight and irreversibly undermining his health.
translations.correctedText: The political prisoner was on hunger strike for 53 days, losing more than 40 kilograms of weight and irreversibly damaging his health.

translations.sourceText: Мужественный политик добился своей цели - представитель США поднял белорусской вопрос в Совбезе ООН.
translations.translatedText: The courageous politician achieved his goal - the representative of the United States raised the Belarusian issue in the UN Security Council.
translations.correctedText: The courageous politician achieved his goal - a United States representative raised the Belarusian problem in the UN Security Council.
